com.artemis

Class EntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.BaseEntitySystem
        • com.artemis.EntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelayedEntityProcessingSystem, EntityProcessingSystem, IntervalEntitySystem

    public abstract class EntitySystem
extends BaseEntitySystem
implements EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
    Tracks a subset of entities, but does not implement any sorting or iteration. Like BaseEntitySystem, but uses Entity references instead of int. This system exists as a convenience for users migrating from other Artemis clones or older versions of odb. We recommend using the int systems over the Entity variants.
    Author:
    Arni Arent, Adrian Papari

      • getEntities

        public Bag<Entity> getEntities()
        Gets the entities processed by this system. Do not delete entities from this bag - it is the live thing.
        Returns:
        System's entity bag, as matched by aspect.
